text: The release of information pertaining to a domestic violence claimant, in addition to the requirements of § 51-113, shall require that:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 15-171, see notes following § 51-131.

DC CODE § 51-136

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Director notify the claimant prior to the release of any information;

The Director shall take reasonable actions to prevent the unnecessary disclosure of personal identifiers, such as the claimant's address, from information otherwise required to be disclosed by law; and
Further dissemination of the information released shall be prohibited.

heading.catch_text: Disclosure of information pertaining to domestic violence claimant.
